successes.title: King's Assembly - A Computer Mouse Full Of Awesome
successes.description: A high-precision laser mouse. A full mechanical keyboard. An analog joystick. Together.

Pledges.description: THANK YOU!! Help us take input devices to the next level! You'll receive a special thanks from our team,  progress updates, and all selected upgrade options!
STICKER BUNDLE!! Receive a special thanks from our team, progress updates, all selected upgrade options, and a set of stickers with logo and product character art!
POSTER!! Receive a special thanks from our team, progress updates, all selected upgrade options, and a poster with logo and product character art on it!
T-SHIRT!! Receive a special thanks from our team, progress updates, all selected upgrade options, and a t-shirt with your choice of logo or product character art!!

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL - ONE HAND OF THE KING'S ASSEMBLY!! Receive a special thanks from our team, progress updates, all selected upgrade options, and your choice of either the Elementalist (the right-handed device in the King's Assembly) or the Strategist (the left-handed device in the King's Assembly)!!

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL - ONE FULL KING'S ASSEMBLY!! Receive a special thanks from our team, progress updates, all selected upgrade options, and a full King's Assembly set, complete with both hands and interconnect cable!!
ONE FULL KING'S ASSEMBLY!! Receive a special thanks from our team, progress updates, all selected upgrade options, and a full King's Assembly set, complete with both hands and interconnect cable!!

BE A KING'S ASSEMBLY PIONEER!! Receive a special thanks from our team, progress updates, all selected upgrade options, and a full King's Assembly set from the regular production run. You will also receive a SIGNED PRE-PRODUCTION King's Assembly set MONTHS BEFORE regular production!!

BE A KING'S ASSEMBLY PIONEER!! Receive a special thanks from our team, progress updates, all selected upgrade options, and a full King's Assembly set from the regular production run. You will also receive a SIGNED PRE-PRODUCTION King's Assembly set MONTHS BEFORE regular production!! Now with international shipping option!!
